author: LohrumIpsum
descr: A scurvy ridden, rules light, art heavy RPG based on Mörk Borg. Inspired by history, fantasy, horror, and rum. Your cutlass & flintlock won't save you from hordes of skeletons and ghost ships...
name: Pirate Borg
shortDescr: A scurvy ridden, rules light, art heavy RPG based on Mörk Borg.
